price: Muwe wenye kutubia kwake, na mcheni Yeye, na shikeni Swala, na wala msiwe katika washirikina.
arabic: ۞ مُنِيبِينَ إِلَيۡهِ وَٱتَّقُوهُ وَأَقِيمُواْ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَلَا تَكُونُواْ مِنَ ٱلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: munībīna ilayhi wa-ittaqūhu wa-aqīmū al-ṣalata walā takūnū mina al-mush'rikīna
